import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Card,Button,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' const Pizza = ({ pizza }) => { const [varient,setVarient] = useState('small') const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(1) return ( <> {pizza.name}
Varients
Quantity
 Price : {pizza.prices[0][varient] * quantity} ) } export default Pizza
